rule: Key words and phrases refer to important or emphasized words or short phrases within the sentence.
input: Science explains phenomena. Experiments test hypotheses. Discoveries expand understanding.
coverage:
```html

Science explains phenomena. Science unravels the complexities of the natural world.

Experiments test hypotheses. Through careful observation and analysis, experiments confirm or refute scientific ideas.

Discoveries expand understanding. With each new finding, our knowledge of the universe deepens and broadens.

```
validityText:
The input provided contains three distinct sentences: "Science explains phenomena.", "Experiments test hypotheses.", and "Discoveries expand understanding." Each sentence is clearly separated by a period and forms a complete thought, adhering to the structure requirement of the input specification. According to the input specification, the text should contain at least three sentences, which this input satisfies, as it includes precisely three sentences. There are no apparent violations of the input specification.

OK
